title: Week 22 Liquidity Mining Proposal
body:
This marks the 22nd week of liquidity mining on Balancer v2. The Ballers propose the following changes which will go into effect 00:00 UTC Monday, October 18th, 2021. 
## ETHEREUM POOLS
No proposed changes this week.
## POLYGON POOLS
No proposed changes this week.
## ARBITRUM POOLS
•	Reduce DEFI5/WETH/WBTC 33/33/33 to 0 BAL per week from flexible BAL.
•	Increase BAL/WETH 60/40 by 500 BAL from flexible BAL. This pool will now receive 4,000 BAL per week.

Link to pull request: https://github.com/balancer-labs/frontend-v2/pull/955
author: 0x176001586fF17ad625Dc387557631710cf485f72
